name: Amethyst Crown
title: A Pact Deeply Felt: Amethyst Crown
desc: "In honor of the eternal oasis and the flourishing Padisarahs, the Lord of Flowers wore an amethyst crown."
in_play_description:
After an opponent takes Dendro DMG when the character to which this is attached is the active character: Gain 1 Crowning Crystal. If your Crowning Crystal count is equal to or higher than the number of cards in your Hand, create 1 random basic Elemental Die.
(Max 2 per Round)
